it.emarolab.owloop.articleExamples.exampleDescriptors

Class DefSubClassDesc

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.owloop.descriptor.construction.descriptorGround.DescriptorGround<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Axiom, Axiom.Descriptor<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>, Axiom.Ground<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>, Class<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>, Class.Restriction<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass,it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.SemanticRestriction>, Class.Sub<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass,DefSubClassDesc>, ClassExpression, ClassExpression.EquivalentRestriction, ClassExpression.Sub<DefSubClassDesc>, DescriptorGroundInterface<org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>

    public class DefSubClassDesc
extends ClassGround
implements ClassExpression.EquivalentRestriction, ClassExpression.Sub<DefSubClassDesc>
    This is an example of a 'compound' Class Descriptor which implements 2 ClassExpression interfaces:
    • EquivalentRestriction: to describe the definition of a Class..
    • ClassExpression.Sub: to describe that a Class subsumes another Class.

    Doing build() with this Descriptor returns the descriptor of type DefSubClassDesc.

    See FullClassDesc for an example of a 'compound' Class Descriptor that implements all ConceptExpressions.

    • Method Detail

      • readExpressionAxioms

        public java.util.List<Axiom.MappingIntent> readExpressionAxioms()
        Description copied from interface: Axiom.Descriptor
        This method is used to update specific Axiom.EntitySet (or Axiom.ExpressionEntitySet) by synchronizing the internal state of the descriptor with the queried OWL structure, such that they are equal. It is based on EntitySet#synchroniseFrom(EntitySet).
        Specified by:
        readExpressionAxioms in interface Axiom.Descriptor<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>
        Specified by:
        readExpressionAxioms in interface Class.Restriction<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass,it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.SemanticRestriction>
        Specified by:
        readExpressionAxioms in interface Class.Sub<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass,DefSubClassDesc>
        Returns:
        the changes made in the Axiom.EntitySet during the reading. Note that the elements of the returned list, may not have the Axiom.MappingIntent.getOntologyChanges() field initialised (i.e.: Void).

      • writeExpressionAxioms

        public java.util.List<Axiom.MappingIntent> writeExpressionAxioms()
        Description copied from interface: Axiom.Descriptor
        This method is used to update the ontology with a specific Axiom.EntitySet (or Axiom.ExpressionEntitySet) by synchronizing the OWL representation with the internal state of the descriptor, such that they are equal. It is based on EntitySet#synchroniseTo(EntitySet).
        Specified by:
        writeExpressionAxioms in interface Axiom.Descriptor<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass>
        Specified by:
        writeExpressionAxioms in interface ClassExpression.EquivalentRestriction
        Specified by:
        writeExpressionAxioms in interface ClassExpression.Sub<DefSubClassDesc>
        Returns:
        the changes made in the OWL ontology during the writing. Note that the elements of the returned list, may have the Axiom.MappingIntent.getOntologyChanges() field initialised (i.e.: OWLOntologyChange).

      • getSubClassDescriptor

        public DefSubClassDesc getSubClassDescriptor(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass instance,
                                             it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences ontology)
        Description copied from interface: Class.Sub
        This method is called by Class.Sub.buildSubClasses() and its purpose is to instantiate a new Class to represent an sub class of this Class Descriptor.
        Specified by:
        getSubClassDescriptor in interface Class.Sub<it.emarolab.amor.owlInterface.OWLReferences,org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass,DefSubClassDesc>
        Parameters:
        instance - the instance to ground the new Class.
        ontology - the ontology in which ground the new Class.
        Returns:
        a new Axiom.Descriptor for all the sub classes of this descriptor.
